statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;

SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE threshold < 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC;

SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE threshold > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity < 50 AND threshold > 20 ORDER BY product_id;
